scripts.supabase:types: npx supabase gen types typescript --project-id vopekxfyorbuyrvzcshy > supabase/types.ts
scripts.supabase:seed: cd supabase && node -e "console.log('Para inserir dados de exemplo, execute: cd supabase && sh migrate.sh')"
scripts.supabase:reset: cd supabase && node -e "console.log('Para resetar o banco de dados, use o painel do Supabase')"
